description: Smallest integer m such that sum_(k=1 to m) phi(k) is divisible by n, where phi(k) is the totient function.
references: Felice Russo, A set of new Smarandache functions, sequences and conjectures in number theory, American Research Press 2000
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := (m = 1; While[! IntegerQ[Sum[EulerPhi[k], {k, 1, m}]/n], m++]; m); a /@ Range[60] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jul 20 2011 *)
author: _Felice Russo_, Feb 25 2000
